BUG_REPORT.SUMMARY: The BirthDay field isn't fill in with the date in the format date ММ/DD/YYYY
BUG_REPORT.TEST_STEP1: Create a new family database by clicking on the button [New Datebase] when the Husband tab is open
BUG_REPORT.TEST_STEP2: Entering the date in the BirthDay field in the MM/DD/YYYY format using a keyboard
BUG_REPORT.EXPECTED_RESULT: The BirthDay field is fill in with the date in the format date ММ/DD/YYYY
BUG_REPORT.ACTUAL_RESULT: The BirthDay field is fill in with the date in the format date DD/MM/YYYY
